dict.string: Oralable would like to save your sleep and heart rate data to HealthKit for health tracking and integration with other health apps.

Oralable would like to read your sleep and heart rate data from HealthKit for comprehensive health correlation and analysis.
Oralable would like to read your sleep and heart rate data from HealthKit for comprehensive health correlation and analysis.
Oralable uses Bluetooth to connect to your Oralable device for real-time health monitoring.

Oralable needs Bluetooth to connect to your Oralable device for real-time health monitoring of PPG, heart rate, and accelerometer data.
Oralable needs Bluetooth to connect to your Oralable device for real-time health monitoring of PPG, heart rate, and accelerometer data.
